org.xbmc.android.remote.business

Class ControlManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbmc.android.remote.business.AbstractManager
      • org.xbmc.android.remote.business.ControlManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IControlManager, IManager, INotifiableManager

    public class ControlManager
extends AbstractManager
implements IControlManager, INotifiableManager
    Asynchronously wraps the InfoClient class.
    Author:
    Team XBMC

      • seek

        public void seek(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
        SeekType type,
        int progress,
        Context context)
        Seeks to a position. If type is
        • absolute - Sets the playing position of the currently playing media as a percentage of the media's length.
        • relative - Adds/Subtracts the current percentage on to the current position in the song
        Specified by:
        seek in interface IControlManager
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        type - Seek type, relative or absolute
        progress - Progress
        context - Context reference
